   </ul>
   <ul class="sidepanel-location-choice-menu">
    <li aria-controls="submenu_unitedstates" aria-expanded="false" aria-label="United States" class="sidepanel-location-choice-parent-item has-children" data-id="1" role="button" tabindex="0">
     <div>
      <a href="/" title="United States">
       United States
      </a>
      <span class="sidepanel-submenu-toggle">
      </span>
     </div>

           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Fitness" data-vars-position="2" href="/fitness/a35885606/running-transformation-eddie-kaufholz/">

           </a>

        <div class="custom-item kettlebell-swing-progressions image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Fitness" data-vars-position="3" href="/fitness/a35876036/kettlebell-swing-progressions/">
           <img alt="mvp" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mh-3-18-eb-mvp-1616084221.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mh-3-18-eb-mvp-1616084221.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mh-3-18-eb-mvp-1616084221.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mh-3-18-eb-mvp-1616084221.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mh-3-18-eb-mvp-1616084221.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Fitness" data-vars-position="3" href="/fitness/a35876036/kettlebell-swing-progressions/">
            MVP Level Up: Kettlebell Swing
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
            <p>
             You'll build athleticism and break through boredom with these variations.
            </p>
           </div>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
            <!-- shared/byline -->
            <div class="byline custom-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
             By
             <span class="byline-name" itemprop="name" rel="author">
              Brett Williams, NASM
             </span>
            </div>
            <!-- / shared/byline -->
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="custom-item cyclist-dylan-lorimer-reddit image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Fitness" data-vars-position="4" href="/fitness/a35863047/cyclist-dylan-lorimer-reddit/">
           <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/screen-shot-2020-07-08-at-10-31-19-am-1594218694.png?crop=0.712xw:1.00xh;0.146xw,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
           </span>
           <img alt="dylan lorimer shows fast cyclists come in all sizes" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/screen-shot-2020-07-08-at-10-31-19-am-1594218694.png?crop=0.712xw:1.00xh;0.146xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/screen-shot-2020-07-08-at-10-31-19-am-1594218694.png?crop=0.712xw:1.00xh;0.146xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/screen-shot-2020-07-08-at-10-31-19-am-1594218694.png?crop=0.712xw:1.00xh;0.146xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/screen-shot-2020-07-08-at-10-31-19-am-1594218694.png?crop=0.712xw:1.00xh;0.146xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/screen-shot-2020-07-08-at-10-31-19-am-1594218694.png?crop=0.712xw:1.00xh;0.146xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Fitness" data-vars-position="4" href="/fitness/a35863047/cyclist-dylan-lorimer-reddit/">
            This Rider Shows Fast Cyclists Come in All Sizes
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
            <p>
             After skeptics questioned his impressive times, Dylan Lorimer set out to prove that cyclists come in all sizes.
            </p>
           </div>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">

            <div class="byline custom-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">

             <span class="byline-name" itemprop="name" rel="author">

     <div class="feed-block feed-block-default feed-block-4-across" data-block-template="default">
      <div class="feed-block-inner">
       <div class="feed-block-header">
        <h2 class="feed-block-heading">

         <div class="custom-item best-sneaker-sales-deals-2021 column-right">
          <div class="custom-item-inner">
           <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Style &amp; Gear" data-vars-position="5" href="/style/g35267112/best-sneaker-sales-deals-2021/">
            <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mh-2-19-sneakers-1613761437.png?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
            </span>
            <img alt="best sneaker deals" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mh-2-19-sneakers-1613761437.png?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mh-2-19-sneakers-1613761437.png?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mh-2-19-sneakers-1613761437.png?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mh-2-19-sneakers-1613761437.png?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mh-2-19-sneakers-1613761437.png?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-content">
            <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Style &amp; Gear" data-vars-position="5" href="/style/g35267112/best-sneaker-sales-deals-2021/">
             The 17 Best Sneakers on Sale Right Now
            </a>

             <p>
              Save big on top styles from Nike, Adidas, Reebok, and more.
             </p>
            </div>

     <div class="feed-block feed-block-big-story" data-block-template="big-story">
      <div class="feed-block-header">
       <h2 class="feed-block-heading">
        <span>
         MH COVER GUYS
        </span>
       </h2>
      </div>
      <div class="feed-block-content" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="dc6035f6-00f3-4a1c-8c65-a70f42cd7f24" data-vars-block-slot="11" data-vars-block-type="Big Story Block">
       <div class="custom-item michael-b-jordan-without-remorse-interview text-under">
        <div class="custom-item-inner">
         <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-2x1" data-vars-cta="MH COVER GUYS" data-vars-position="1" href="/entertainment/a35651743/michael-b-jordan-without-remorse-interview/">
          <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mh-mbj-index-1615903043.png?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
          </span>
          <img alt="michael b jordan" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mh-mbj-index-1615903043.png?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=320:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mh-mbj-index-1615903043.png?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=480:* 480w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mh-mbj-index-1615903043.png?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=640:* 640w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mh-mbj-index-1615903043.png?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=980:* 980w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mh-mbj-index-1615903043.png?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=1024:* 1024w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mh-mbj-index-1615903043.png?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=1120:* 1120w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
         </a>
         <div class="custom-item-content">
          <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="MH COVER GUYS" data-vars-position="1" href="/entertainment/a35651743/michael-b-jordan-without-remorse-interview/">
           Michael B. Jordan Is Strong, Calm, and in Control in 2021
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
           Actor,  director, and activist Michael B. Jordan talks about winning at career chess, finding  purpose, staying  in shape, and his new …
          </div>
          <span class="custom-item-meta">
           <!-- shared/byline -->
           <div class="byline custom-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
            By
            <span class="byline-name" itemprop="name" rel="author">
             Gerrick Kennedy
            </span>
           </div>
           <!-- / shared/byline -->
          </span>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

    <div class="feed-block-container block-style- block-layout-image-stacked">
     <div class="feed-block feed-block-default feed-block-4-across" data-block-template="default">
      <div class="feed-block-inner">
       <div class="feed-block-content" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="f51c060e-35f3-4d99-b415-b6ad6d5f84c8" data-vars-block-slot="12" data-vars-block-type="4 Across Block">
        <div class="custom-item lenny-kravitz-interview-cover-story image-stacked">

       <div class="feed-block-header">
        <h2 class="feed-block-heading">
         <a href="https://www.menshealth.com/trending-news/">
          Latest News
         </a>
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="feed-block-content" data-vars-block-curation="Site" data-vars-block-id="4768da5c-f186-4002-bba4-69c89f8b9140" data-vars-block-slot="14" data-vars-block-type="Page Content Block">
        <div class="custom-item weight-loss-transformation-210-pounds-doctor-brand-new-me">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Latest News" data-vars-position="1" href="/weight-loss/a35894786/weight-loss-transformation-210-pounds-doctor-brand-new-me/">
           <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/brand-new-me-1616337894.png?crop=0.565xw:1.00xh;0.218xw,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
           </span>

  <script id="deferred-css-script-tag">
   ( function( d, Modernizr ) {
	d.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() {
		var l, h = d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ],
		f = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/menshealth/assets/css/homepage.0a8ed0b.css"],
		m = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/menshealth/assets/css/homepage-mobile.6ec1c4f.css"];

		for ( var i = 0, len = f.length; i < len; i++ ) {
			l = d.createElement( "link" );
			l.rel = "stylesheet";
			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];

			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
		}
	} );
} )( document, Modernizr );
  </script>
